name: ERC20 Mintable
description: Extension of ERC20 that contains the mint function used to create new tokens and therefore increase the supply.

eventDecorators.name: Token transfer
eventDecorators.description: Indicates that ERC20 transfer has occurred.

parameterDecorators.name: Sender address
parameterDecorators.description: Address from which the ERC20 token was sent.

parameterDecorators.name: Recipient address
parameterDecorators.description: Address to which the ERC20 token was sent.

parameterDecorators.name: Token amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of ERC20 token that was sent.

functionDecorators.name: Mint
functionDecorators.description: Creates new amount of tokens and assigns them to the given wallet.

parameterDecorators.name: Wallet address
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the wallet to receive the newly created tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: Token amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of the tokens to create.
